## Settings type

Defines the parameters you may set on the routes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Settings = {
    public?: boolean;
};
```

## Remarks

See the example in the [Login](./foundation-login.login.md) class in the router's `configure` method for usage. All parameters are Optional.
